Token.title: API
Token.description: This is your API access information.
Token.warning: Do not share this token with others, because your account security can be compromised.

DisplayLanguage.title: Display Language
DisplayLanguage.description: Display language affects the website UI and the Discord bot.

ViewportBound.title: Bind to viewport size
ViewportBound.description: Ensure images do not overflow outside viewport.

LeftToRight.title: Page ordering
LeftToRight.description: Change the horizontal order of pages.
LeftToRight.toggle: {value, select, true {Left to right} false {Right to left}}

ImagesPerRow.title: Pages per row
ImagesPerRow.description: Limit the number of pages in each row.

SingleCover.title: Cover as single page
SingleCover.description: Show the cover image as a single page row.

SfwMode.title: SFW Mode
SfwMode.description: All images will be replaced with placeholders.

BookTag: {value, select, artist {Artist} circle {Circle} character {Character} parody {Parody} series {Series} convention {Convention} metadata {Metadata} tag {Tag} other {{value}}}
BookCategory: {value, select, doujinshi {Doujinshi} manga {Manga} artistCg {Artist CG} gameCg {Game CG} lightNovel {Light novel} other {{value}}}
BookSort: {value, select, relevance {Relevance} createdTime {Uploaded time} updatedTime {Updated time} pageCount {Page count} noteCount {Note count} tagCount {Tag count} refreshTime {Refresh time} other {{value}}}
ObjectType: {value, select, user {User} book {Book} image {Image} snapshot {Snapshot} collection {Collection} other {{value}}}
LanguageType: {value, select, enUS {English} jaJP {日本語} zhCN {中文} koKR {한국어} itIT {Italiano} esES {Español} deDE {Deutsch} frFR {français} trTR {Türkçe} nlNL {Nederlands} ruRU {русский} idID {Bahasa Indonesia} viVN {Tiếng Việt} other {{value}}}
